Sinfonietta for Brass Band - The Wayfarer
Molinnis Park, Bugle, Cornwall, England, UK March ('The Senator' - George Allen): 1 Bodmin, 48 2 Camborne, 47 3 St Austell, 46 4 Mount Charles, 45 5 Luckett's Travel, 44
Best Player: Stuart Chappell, flugel, Camborne
Best Soprano: Chris North, St. Austell Best Solo Cornet: Peter Minear, St. Austell Kernow Best Euphonium: Steve Osborne, Bodmin Best Solo Horn: Mark Letcher, Bodmin Best Set of Basses: Camborne
A. R. Trudgian Youth Awards: Victoria Kellow, Paul Villiers
Deportment (judge Gareth Roberts): 1 Bodmin 2 Bugle (Class C)
July 16, 2010, 10:46 p.m. Aug. 6, 2013, 3:06 p.m.
